casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 24, 2008

[Cite as 10124/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-5500.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Sherrills.

On March 31, 2008, this court found Daries Sherrills to be a vexatious litigator under S.CtPrae.R. XIV(5)(B). This court further ordered that Sherrills was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On October 20, 2008, Sherrills submitted a request for leave to file an appeal. Upon review of the proffered filing, the court finds it without merit. Accordingly,

It is ordered by the court that Sherrills is denied leave to file an appeal.
